ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Mass
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'Total Mass of the payload'

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Explosive Mass
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'Mass of explosive'
ComponentAtbSDs.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Payload Type') = 0 || Ability('Payload Type') = 1, true, false)

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: TNT Equivalent
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'TNT eq of explosive mass'
ComponentAtbSDs.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Payload Type') = 0 || Ability('Payload Type') = 1, true, false)

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Frag Mass
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'Mass of individual fragments'
ComponentAtbSDs.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Payload Type') = 0, true, false)

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Frag Count
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'Number of individual fragments'
ComponentAtbSDs.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Payload Type') = 0, true, false)

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Frag Cone Angle
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'Cone angle, larger is more efficent per fragment'
ComponentAtbSDs.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Payload Type') = 0, true, false)

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Mass0
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'Total Mass of the payload'
ComponentAtbSDs.AttributeFormula: if(Ability('Payload Type') = 0, Ability('Explosive Mass') + Ability('Frag Mass') * Ability('Frag Count'), 0)

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: ExplDataBlob
ComponentAtbSDs.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Payload Type') = 0, true, false)
ComponentAtbSDs.AttributeFormula: AtbConstrArgs(Ability('Trigger Type'), Ability('Mass0'), Ability('TNT Equivalent'), Ability('Frag Mass'), Ability('Frag Count'), Ability('Frag Cone Angle'))

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Liner Radius
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'Affects the shape and velocity of the slug'
ComponentAtbSDs.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Payload Type') = 1, true, false)

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Liner Cone Height
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'Affects the shape and velocity of the slug'
ComponentAtbSDs.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Payload Type') = 1, true, false)

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Liner Thickness
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'Affects the shape and velocity of the slug'
ComponentAtbSDs.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Payload Type') = 1, true, false)

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: LinerDensity
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'Density of copper'

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: LinerVolume
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'volume of the cone liner'
ComponentAtbSDs.AttributeFormula: Ability('Liner Thickness') * 3.14159265359 * Ability('Liner Radius') * Ability('Liner Radius') + Sqrt( Pow(Ability('Liner Cone Height'),2) + Pow(Ability('Liner Radius'),2) )

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Mass1
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'Total Mass of the payload'
ComponentAtbSDs.AttributeFormula: if(Ability('Payload Type') = 1, Ability('Explosive Mass') + Ability('LinerVolume') * 1000 / Ability('LinerDensity') , 0)

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: ShapeDataBlob
ComponentAtbSDs.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Payload Type') = 1, true, false)
ComponentAtbSDs.AttributeFormula: AtbConstrArgs(Ability('Trigger Type'), Ability('Mass1'), Ability('TNT Equivalent'), Ability('Liner Radius'), Ability('Liner Cone Height'))

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Submunition Type
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'Pre-Designed missile to use as a submunition'
ComponentAtbSDs.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Payload Type') = 2, true, false)

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Submunition Count
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'Number of submunitions in this payload'
ComponentAtbSDs.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Payload Type') = 2, true, false)

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: SubMunitionWeight
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'How the hell am I going to get this'

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Mass2
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'Total Mass of the payload'

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: SubmDataBlob
ComponentAtbSDs.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Payload Type') = 2, true, false)
ComponentAtbSDs.AttributeFormula: AtbConstrArgs(Ability('Trigger Type'), Ability('Mass2'), Ability('Submunition Type'), Ability('Submunition Count'))

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Antenna Size
ComponentAtbSDs.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Guidance Type') = 2 || Ability('Guidance Type') = 3, true, false)
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'Gives an effective area of:  '

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Effective Size
ComponentAtbSDs.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Guidance Type') = 2 || Ability('Guidance Type') = 3, true, false)

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Ideal Detection Wavelength
ComponentAtbSDs.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Guidance Type') = 2 || Ability('Guidance Type') = 3, true, false)
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'The wavelength this sensor is most efficient at detecting'

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Detection Bandwidth
ComponentAtbSDs.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Guidance Type') = 2 || Ability('Guidance Type') = 3, true, false)
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'How far from the ideal wavelength will this still detect a signal'

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Efficiency
ComponentAtbSDs.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Guidance Type') = 2 || Ability('Guidance Type') = 3, true, false)

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Sensitivity at Ideal Wavelength
ComponentAtbSDs.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Guidance Type') = 2 || Ability('Guidance Type') = 3, true, false)
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'Smallest signal this can detect at the ideal wavelength, lower is better.

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Sensitivity at Worst Wavelength
ComponentAtbSDs.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Guidance Type') = 2 || Ability('Guidance Type') = 3, true, false)
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'Smallest signal this can detect at the worst wavelength, lower is better.'

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Resolution
ComponentAtbSDs.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Guidance Type') = 2 || Ability('Guidance Type') = 3, true, false)
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'How much detail it can get from a detection. affects likelyhood of component detection etc. '

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Scan Time
ComponentAtbSDs.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Guidance Type') = 2 || Ability('Guidance Type') = 3, true, false)
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'how long it takes to complete a full scan'

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Mass
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'Mass Calculation'

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: DatablobArguments
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: '(int GuidanceTypeEnumValue, int TriggerType)'

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: SensorDatablobArguments
ComponentAtbSDs.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Guidance Type') = 2 || Ability('Guidance Type') = 3, true, false)
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: '(double peakWaveLength, double bandwidth, double bestSensitivity, double worstSensitivity, double resolution, double scanTime)'
ComponentAtbSDs.AttributeFormula: AtbConstrArgs(Ability('Ideal Detection Wavelength'), Ability('Detection Bandwidth'), Ability('Sensitivity at Ideal Wavelength'), Ability('Sensitivity at Worst Wavelength'), Ability('Resolution'), Ability('Scan Time'))

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Engine Mass
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'Mass of the engine'

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Exhaust Velocity
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'Specific Impulse in m/s, can be increased by research (todo)'

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Fuel Consumption
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'Fuel Consumption per second'

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Thrust
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'The maximum thrust output of this engine in N'

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Size Efficency
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'The amount of tonnage taken up by racking, office space etc.'

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Cargo Transfer Rate
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'How much cargo can be transfered per hour in kg.'

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Transfer Range
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'How much Dv can be expended to transfer cargo'

ComponentAtbSDs.Name: Total Cargo Stored
ComponentAtbSDs.DescriptionFormula: 'The amount of cargo this can store.'
